name: Renewal
description:
Regrow an empty wasteland! - This game was made in 9 days for Go Godot Jam.

Explore the wasteland and harvest its resources as you attempt to grow as much foliage as you can - your goal is to cover 50% of the landscape with plants!

Controls: WASD for movement, E to open your inventory, left click to use the selected item and right click to interact with objects.

Along the way you'll encounter dangerous wolves, who get more aggressive as you stray further away from your starting oasis. Upgrade your tools to venture further out and conquer more land.

Grow tomatoes to recover stamina before you fade away into the sands, and use Enrichers in combination with the rich oasis water to create fertile soil on which to plant seeds!
